page.title: 17 CONCLUSION
page.content:
The area has very little in it except for farms although there is the main A229 Maistone to Hastings road on the east most end.
As a result of this the pupils were not perhaps as enthusiastic in doing the survey as one migh have hoped.
In spite of their reluctance to produce exciting prose they did manage learn a great deal about the area (even though it did not contain their own town of Cranbrook).
Keyboard skills were also improved although they still took a long time to type even what has been roduced.
